description: Try our easy to follow Pepper Steak With White Cabbage Remoulade & Crispy Sprouts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Brussels sprout,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Beef,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pepper Steak With White Cabbage Remoulade & Crispy Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g small white potatoes, cut into 2cm chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Toss potatoes and sprouts with 2 tbs of oil in a large baking dish. Season. Roast for 20 minutes or until golden brown and crisp.

Meanwhile, drizzle steaks with remaining oil and season. Heat a frying pan or skillet over high heat. Sear steaks for 3 minutes on each side (for medium) or until cooked to your liking. Rest, covered, for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, to make remoulade, whisk mayonnaise, mustard and lemon juice together in a large bowl. Coarsely grate cabbage and toss with mayonnaise mixture.
Slice steak and serve with vegetables and remoulade.
